snippet: Having become an afterthought in the Yankees’ bullpen, Joba Chamberlain agreed to a one-year, $2.5 million deal with Detroit, a person close to him said.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; pitcher Joba Chamberlain agrees to a one-year, $2.5 million deal with Detroit Tigers, leaving New York Yankees after seven seasons; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: Having become an afterthought in the Yankees’ bullpen, Joba Chamberlain agreed to a one-year, $2.5 million deal with Detroit, a person close to him said.

headline.main: Chamberlain Is Said to Get Fresh Start With the Tigers
headline.print_headline: Chamberlain Is Said to Get Fresh Start With the Tigers
